component.name: Package Updater
component.summary: COSMIC Package Updater Applet for Arch Linux

description.p: A modern package update manager applet for the COSMIC desktop environment on Arch Linux, providing seamless package management directly from the panel.
Features include support for pacman, paru, and yay package managers, visual status indicators, automatic update checking, and separate tracking of official repository and AUR packages.
Initial release of COSMIC Package Updater Applet

ul.li: Support for pacman, paru, and yay package managers
Visual status indicators in COSMIC panel
Automatic update checking with configurable intervals
Separate tracking of official and AUR packages
